sig_info: Absorbing the very fabric of enemy psyche, every Life or Power Steal has a 10 to 35% chance to be Critical, increasing the amount absorbed.

PASSIVE: After absorbing the power of Carol Danvers, the original Ms. Marvel, Rogue possessed an amalgamated mutant/Kree physiology, decreasing the duration of Debuffs by 70%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Replicates 5 of the opponent's active Buffs. Opponents cannot activate those Buffs as long as Rogue holds them. Rogue's Replicate effect does not work on opponents of the Tech Class, or Unstoppable Buffs.
Replicated Buffs stay active as long as Rogue keeps touching the opponent, after which all Replicated Buffs on her will be Nullified.
The second hit of this Attack deals 48.72 Energy Damage, and then Regenerates Rogue for 48.72 health.
Rogue is healed for 100% of the Life Stolen.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% Chance per hit to Power Steal, taking 9% of their Power as your own.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% Chance to Power Steal, taking 27% of their Power as your own.
Activates 1 Buff per type that was Replicated during the fight. Buffs stay active as long as Rogue keeps touching the opponent. Opponents can not activate those Buffs as long as Rogue holds them.
